website_summaries.verdict: Though its clamshell design isn't pretty, the Kyocera DuraXT is tough as nails, with great call quality, and a respectable camera to boot.
pros: The Kyocera DuraXT has an indestructible design, a decent camera, push-to-talk direct connect, and solid call quality
cons: The DuraXT isn't easy on the eyes, it has a nonstandard 2.5mm headset jack, and it can accumulate moisture underneath its screens

customer_reviews.title: sprint contact said it's not compatible will not work
customer_reviews.text: bought this phone for my mother, when tried to activate with sprint it will not work the IMED numbers is not compatible with the sprint system. THE PHONE SAYS SPRINT BUT ITS A THIRD PARTY BOGAS PHONE PLEASE DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Momfud

customer_reviews.title: As utilitarian as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: This is not my phone. It does not take great pictures, it doesn't do face time, it doesn't have an array of games, synthesizers, or have a great browser. What this is then, is my wife's phone. She wanted a phone that wasn't fancy, that made calls, that didn't "do" things. She's over the moon. This phone is ugly, clunky, bulky, and it bounces every time (seriously) she drops it. She loves this device as a replacement for her 9 year old flip she refused to surrender until it wheezed it's final breath. It gets five stars for what it is - an ugly, rugged, makes-calls cell phone that is exactly what my wife was after. Silly gal.
customer_reviews.author: MusicoMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone!
customer_reviews.text: My husband does not like touch screens and was thrilled the get this flip phone. It was missing the micro SD card displayed in the advertisement as well as the manual. No problems activating it with Sprint.
customer_reviews.author: Pie time

customer_reviews.title: Very good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had these phones for years. They are great phones and take a lot of abuse. They do not have a touch screen, but I don't care about that. You can drop these in water, dry them out for a day and they work. They don't break when you drop them on the floor. I bought this one because my brand new Kyocera stopped working--only a year old. This older model works better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with Sprint Network
customer_reviews.text: It clearly says compatible with Sprint so I purchased it. But when I got it and checked the numbers on the box on the Sprint website, it said this phone could not be used on the Sprint network. I was so disappointed because it's such a neat little simple to operate phone. They need to stop saying this phone can be used on the Sprint network.
customer_reviews.author: Passerby1010

customer_reviews.title: The BEST thing for school age kids
customer_reviews.text: It is simple. The contacts are easy to pull up. I only use the phone for calls. By setting it up without internet, it helps to curtail the compulsion to be on social media. You can text and receive texts on it, though typing a text can be someone cumbersome. The iPad can the locked away at night or during dinner if they already have one. Addiction to the internet is a serious matter. not want it to connect it to the internet, so I do not use that option, due to cost. It is a lot cheaper than an iPad and will prevent them from being glued to social media.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my Aunt in a Nursing home
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt had a stroke and is unable to use her left arm so touch screen phones are out. Usually buy her flip phone like the Razr however they break fast this phone is coated well and basically indestructible I challeneged her to break this I will just order another one. Sprint gave me a hard time activating it but they're A**holes
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, just buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -LOUD!!! I never miss calls with this thing. -No pocket dialing -Musical touch-tones :) -Practically unbreakable Cons: -Not a smart phone -No qwerty keyboard for texting Recommendation: If you don't need the apps on a smart phone, stop looking and buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jai Bhagti Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Out dated
customer_reviews.text: Will not work on the sprint net work doesn’t come with the right sd card
customer_reviews.author: lyle mccanon

customer_reviews.title: Got this for Mother in Law, did not work good.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work good, hard to hear people, and they could not hear you. Ended up getting a different phone from local Sprint store. Seems rugged but not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Grant D. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Phone died 5 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 5 months. Then it just died. No support available at Sprint Store. Have to buy a new phone now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Sprint network
customer_reviews.text: Unable to be activated by Sprint. The tech said that it was made for a cell network/contractor associated with Sprint, but not Sprint itself. I am forced to return this.
customer_reviews.author: ToughTuc

customer_reviews.title: Phone delay is serious
customer_reviews.text: The telephone signal is very poor, “sprint”the telephone company often has an accident, and the telephone is often not used normally. Very contemptuous of “sprint”
customer_reviews.author: Jackson newmen

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My bf is rough on phones and only likes flip phones. This phone meets all requirements! The price was great and the condition was pleasantly wonderful. This was a birthday gift and he is more than pleased. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: P. Ritz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! It's nice to ditch the iPhone and go back to something more simple. It seems to be very rugged and tough. Has a few scuffs in the outside but the screens are perfect and free of any damage. It came with a new battery and charging cord. Ian going to be buying 2 more of these phones to have just in case. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST PUNISHMENT FOR A TEENAGER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This phone has met all of our parenting expectations! It's ugly, bulky, loud, and extremely embarrassing for a teen girl to have to use in front of all her friends. After using it for one month, our teen's grades have dramatically improved, and there is less backtalk when it comes to chores. Since you can't download the popular apps she has less screen time, and more family bonding time! Thanks so much for providing such an effective tool for punishment! Sincerely, Happy Mom
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a husband that won't switch to a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have a touch-screen...
customer_reviews.text: ...it's not supposed to have a touch screen, so it doesn't. Works flawlessly, although, I wish they had given me the master password, I've not needed it for much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan P. D.

customer_reviews.title: my next one was a Kyocera like this and now I have this one
customer_reviews.text: My longest owned phone was a Samsung Milspech, my next one was a Kyocera like this and now I have this one. I much preferred the menu on the Samsung as well as separate incoming and out going phone logs with time and duration. However I am a geezer and want a geezer phone that will handle some abuse. I did not want the camera either, it makes the phone thicker and tight in my holster... but maybe someday I will have a use for it.. I also do not send or receive texts.. IT IS A PHONE for goodness sake
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE IT'S UNLOCKED!
customer_reviews.text: Here's the problem: It's locked and had to send it back. You can see it is well made but that's all!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for elderly people to use
customer_reviews.text: As stated phone was brand new my 86 old dad can use it very easy and the battery last a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: kevin swartz

customer_reviews.title: Still works with sprint as of Sept 2020
customer_reviews.text: My 87 year old Mother in law, whom I greatly appreciate, uses this phone. Not too hard to figure out once she got used to it. After she started using the speaker phone option live got better for her. She is in a nursing home, it is a nice connection to the outer world as we have limited visiting privileges right now.
customer_reviews.author: Merle

customer_reviews.title: not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It is not the prettiest or most sophisticated, but it serves its purpose well. We got this phone to temporarily replace a broken one. It was purchased for its durability and it has, so far, not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Veach

customer_reviews.title: I was not able to activate this phone with Sprint ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to activate this phone with Sprint. Called customer support. They were not able to activate it too. Advised to visit local store. Local Sprint store rep was not able to activate it as well. Most likely it is a prepaid phone. Returning it back to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ken P

customer_reviews.title: Good, rugged basic phone
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a basic, rugged phone with no frills to just make phone calls and this fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Amberger

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy
customer_reviews.text: Husband says it does what he needs it to do, hello and good bye and an occasional photo that you can barely see on the tiny screen
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: An excellent phone choice for anyone needing durability
customer_reviews.text: This phone is very durable. The quality is there. My brother is a contractor adn these phones are not treated well and still keep on working. Battery life is unbelievable and this is a great phone. Highly recomend if you need simplicity adn a work phone that cna take punishment.
customer_reviews.author: pegmorris

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is poor!
customer_reviews.text: Was not a NEW phone as advertised!!!! Came in a open box. Had someone else's phone number programmed into the voice mail. Was forced to keep because of time constraints! The volume/ringer volume button on the side of the phone is way to sensitive! Any light touch and its either to high or off! Sound quality is poor!
customer_reviews.author: Ilsa Kerscher

customer_reviews.title: Very bad condition
customer_reviews.text: I got it and it was all scratched up the screen was scratched. Can’t believe you sell something this bad. I am very disappointed in you all !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone cannot be activated
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a rip off! Sprint does no activation available nor does Ting. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: L. Atkeson

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It is extremely durable, and reliable. It is compact and I can still take pictures/video with it also. I don't need a fancy phone and I never worry about cracking the screen.
customer_reviews.author: derek rebhahn

customer_reviews.title: I like having this as a backup and you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: What a rocking little phone! Plays well with Ting. I like having this as a backup and you don't have to worry about the battery running down every day. Mine easily keeps the charge for a week or more.
customer_reviews.author: emino

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: Good Phone for a teenager who continually drops and mistreats his device. Texting is not easy, but I prefer to speak with him rather than text.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Walker

customer_reviews.title: I lent the phone to a marine for a weekend ...
customer_reviews.text: I lent the phone to a marine for a weekend. The phone he returns was beat up but still worked, requiring redialing of numbers ... perhaps 3-5 for a connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Drone

customer_reviews.title: Has web service too.
customer_reviews.text: This is my carry phone. I have a ATT go phone at home and kinda use it around the house like a light weight laptop. My flip takes a beating and gets out better. Battery last longer too.
customer_reviews.author: William L Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Flipper not happy
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the fact that it did not answer the call when I flipped it open.
customer_reviews.author: denise frazier

customer_reviews.title: This phone arrived in like new condition
customer_reviews.text: This phone arrived in like new condition, and has performed flawlessly since day one. Its very rugged and field-suited. Its been dropped on concrete already with no compromise in performance.The owner's manual can be downloaded, too. I'm confident this phone will last until the wireless provider cuts off the signal,
customer_reviews.author: Sue, New Orleans

customer_reviews.title: Great Flip Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone. Durable, Easy to use. Small and lite.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E. Reyna Sr.

customer_reviews.title: walkie talkie like discussions, otherwise good durable phone
customer_reviews.text: Picks up outside discussions......walkie talkie like discussions, otherwise good durable phone

customer_reviews.title: the best flip phone i ever had
customer_reviews.text: durable phone with great sound, and a long battery life. don't know why amazon wants me to rate the touch screen on a flip phone though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: came in great shape 2nd hand and works fine at a fraction ...
customer_reviews.text: Does just what I need. no fancy nonsense. came in great shape 2nd hand and works fine at a fraction of the cost from one of the phone company bandits.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wexler

customer_reviews.title: nice phone. never lose connection
customer_reviews.text: nice phone. never lose connection. good battery last at least three days before charging. Too bad it only connects with sprint therefore you cannot switch the sim card. stupid network, I can't wait to run away from them once my contract is done.
customer_reviews.author: paul vales

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the phone..He isn't into I phones..lol..but he loves flip phones and this one has been his favorite

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Sprint
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly, but was no good. I wasted 3 hours online, on the phone and in person with Sprint and this phone is not compatiable. So much for it being a Sprint phone. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacing basic phone
customer_reviews.text: My old Sprint basic phone went bad; needed a new phone quick without Sprint bumping me up to a more expensive plan for a free phone with renewing my contract. It seems to be a great phone, easy to use. If you drop your phone a lot this is a good phone to have; rugged. It's easy to read and operate. My old Bluetooth device hooked up easily. Great phone for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. I bought 2. They both didn't have good sound. On speaker it was clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I don't need all the bells and whistles, just something to talk and text with. This phone is for people who want a PHONE. Loud speaker-phone, long lasting battery, and heavy duty. Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: DuraXT Works Good
customer_reviews.text: The Direct Connect Radio /Phone works good. I wish the Sprint network would hurry up and finish upgrading in the Phoenix area so they would work GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Neato
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these for my mom and she likes it so much that i got one for my dad. Does everything but make breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: The phone is super loud and the buttons are easy to see and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my 61 year old dad. He loves it. The phone is super loud and the buttons are easy to see and navigate. I would recommend this phone to anyone who is looking for a basic phone.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Matter Matters

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This phone works great with my hearing aides. It rings loud enough that I hear it every time it rings, no more missed calls.

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my grandson and what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson and what I was looking for was the "rugged" feature. So far it appears to fit the bill perfectly and the price was very affordable.

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as it should! Activated it with sprint no problem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My brother needed a phone built like a tank. This phone is the bomb for real.

customer_reviews.title: Product is in excellent working condition
customer_reviews.text: The phone is in excellent physical and working condition. It exceeded my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and rugged
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone for my mom. Super durable and rugged.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone was exactly as advertised with no problems activating on an existing line. I will order from them again.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE

customer_reviews.title: KYOCERA E4277 REMARKS FROM CUSTOMER.
customer_reviews.text: Item is well received and well packaged. Cosmetics on the phone is a 9 of 10. Very clean and no scratches. I am a very well satisfied customer. I will recommend. Thank you very much.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Smart phone not needed
customer_reviews.text: The phone works good. This was purchased for an elderly parent that might be more likely to drop it. The clamshell design, large buttons, and grip texture make it a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Clift Jones

customer_reviews.title: Broken Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Phone came with no sim card, and was broken! The headset speaker was broken! You had to put calls on speaker to be able to hear anything. I am returning this. Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Renae Kempf

customer_reviews.title: No issues!
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. No problems activating it. Have had it for more that 6 months and no issues with it. Will buy again from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lizamarie Valle

customer_reviews.title: customer service great
customer_reviews.text: I initially had trouble verifying with my cell phone company that this phone was available to add to my plan, but the seller was EXTREMELY helpful and honest and was able to square everything away so that the phone is up and running for me. GREAT!!!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This phone is being sold as unlocked. They are NOT unlocked, they're Sprint phones!! Beware!

customer_reviews.title: Phone works great for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great for my Dad. It was exactly what he wanted at the right price. Product was just as advertised. Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Practically new phone, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a used phone from them. It arrived in almost brand new condition with charger. There was no box or manual but it was really easy to figure out. The phone itself is not impressive but it's very rugged and is a great replacement with a clean ESN. Would order from them again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Stolen phone on amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible
customer_reviews.text: This phone was NOT able to be connected by Sprint. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great most of the time
customer_reviews.text: It works great most of the time, but glitches when I try to add a photo attachment to a text in progress. It gives me a black screen, and the text vanishes without warning sometimes. This specific one didn't have a cover for the charger port, which wouldn't be a huge issue, except that I have 2 kids under 3, and the port is a potential weak spot. Otherwise, it's fantastic. I like the quality of the pictures for a clamshell, and it's wonderfully durable. It works well for me, since I don't access the internet, but merely use it for pictures, text, and talking.
customer_reviews.author: Hardworking Mama

customer_reviews.title: my husband love this phone
customer_reviews.text: My husband love the phone - he like the old fashion and easy phone to use - plus he is always dropping and breaking phones.

customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just what I was looking for. Nice rugged phone. It keeps my husband in touch with his men no matter where he is.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Nickoles

customer_reviews.title: The phone works well for my 15 daughter. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone works well for my 15 daughter. I have purchased about 6 phones for her in 2 years. All of which are broken within a few months. This one so far is taking a beating and still working. Sprint activated the phone too with no issue.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is a durable and useful phone.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is okay but the battery died shortly after buying. I suppose it's to be somewhat expected. Other than that it is a durable and useful phone.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, everything good but didn't come with battery :(
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, great phone but only thing is that it didn't come with a battery which I had to call to order the battery and wait for it. Inconvenient a bit.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: okay. Ringer, at highest volume setting, is ...
customer_reviews.text: okay. Ringer, at highest volume setting, is n't loud enough. Texting and messaging work, but not very logically. I would not buy again. However, the phone was affordable, and it does work.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Phone works perfectly! A bargain purchase. I was a bit concerned because the "do not accept if seal is broken" seal was broken, but since it is a refurbished phone, I figured that it would be OK. Great value; phone is rugged and has very loud ringer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my boyfriend because his phone broke and he just needed something temporarily, and we had to go through hell and back to actually activate it. It was supposed to be for sprint, and it was, but we did not know it was prepaid..........which was annoying. We called sprint customer care multiple times and spent multiple hours on the phone with them. Finally, a whole 7 days later, the phone was able to be activated. So yeah that was annoying
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The phone is in great shape. Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: The photos of the phone on amazon show it coming with a charger, users manual, SD Card, the phone, and the battery. When i got it, all it came with is the phone, charger and battery. Where is my SD card and user manual. The phone is in great shape. Its perfect. But everything else? False advertisement if you ask me.

product_meta.title: Kyocera DuraXT E4277 PTT (Sprint)
product_meta.description:
Phone is for SPRINT, will not work for other carriers. Not compatible with prepaid accounts. 
Whether it's water, dirt, or gravity, job sites are brutal on phones. Take it all on with DuraXT, the push to talk clamshell phone available exclusively for Sprint.
Built for extremes, the ruggedized Kyocera DuraXT meets Military Standard 810G for:
dust
shock
vibration
temperature extremes
blowing rain
low pressure
solar radiation
salt fog
humidity
water immersion

And for those more slippery situations, Dura-Grip provides a rubber, non-slip exterior for sure hold and extra durability.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars333 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
